channel.title: lockdown on Paul's 20% Time
channel.description: Recent content in lockdown on Paul's 20% Time

item.title: Recent brewday: 'Locked Down and Bitter ESB'
item.description: My friend Tom and I were recently bemoaning the fact pubs are still shut for this third, interminable lock-down, and that despite the fact a lot of really good canned beer is available, we would actually quite like a decent pint of British ale.
